page.title: 03Carlton Feast
page.content: Carlton Feast probably started as a Goose Fair in the Middle Ages.Everyone who went would most likely sit down to a meal.Animals would be sold and other objects.But as the years have passed the Goose Fair has developed into Carlton's Annual Feast,with a Queen being the main attraction along with a competition for the best float made by Cubs,Brownies,Guides or the W.I.In years gone by the float themes have been Television Programmes, Personalities and the Wild West etc. The Queens who are chosen at the local pantomime receive the crown from the past Queen.The Feast is on the Saturday closest to Midsummer's Day.This is probably because the Goose Fair was held to celebrate Midsummer.It takes place in Carlton Tower's Grounds and is usually opened by a well known villager.
